projects.name: uMigrate
projects.desc: uMigrate is a social media app for University students. I worked in the Cloud-ops team and did some work for the API team.

projects.name: Yoilith
projects.desc: Top-down shootor game created in Java with many features like random map generation, terrain destruction, explosive weapons, wide range of guns, and combo and score system.

projects.name: Capacitive Touch LED
projects.desc: This project uses a customly designed capacitive touch slider and a button to control the colour of a RGB LED.

projects.name: First Web Game
projects.desc: This is the first project I did back in grade 8. It has a top-down 2D map where you are hunted down by wild animals.
